Serialized Form

  • Package seasofyore

    • Class seasofyore.GameController

      class GameController extends JLayeredPane implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • board
          Board board
          The game logic backend.
        • boardPanel
          BoardPanel boardPanel
          The panel displaying the game board.
        • current
          Player current
          The player whose turn it currently is.
        • currentPhase
          GamePhase currentPhase
          The current phase of the game.
        • curtainClosedState
          boolean curtainClosedState
          Indicates if the curtain is fully closed.
        • curtainClosingState
          boolean curtainClosingState
          Indicates if the curtain is in the process of closing.
        • curtainPanel
          JPanel curtainPanel
          The curtain panel for turn transitions.
        • curtainSpeed
          int curtainSpeed
          The speed of the curtain movement in pixels per frame.
        • curtainTimer
          Timer curtainTimer
          Timer controlling the curtain animations for turn transitions.
        • curtainY
          int curtainY
          The vertical position of the curtain.
        • dragLayerPanel
          JPanel dragLayerPanel
          The drag layer panel for handling drag-and-drop operations, and any high-layer effects rendering that might need to be seen.
        • gamePanel
          JPanel gamePanel
          The main game panel containing the board and terminal.
        • returnToTitle
          Runnable returnToTitle
          Runnable to return to the title screen. Not configured.
        • salvoMode
          boolean salvoMode
          Indicates whether the game is in Salvo mode (multi-shot turns).
        • sidebarPanel
          SidebarPanel sidebarPanel
          The panel displaying the ship selection sidebar.
        • terminal
          TerminalPanel terminal
          The terminal panel for displaying game messages and housing the cool flag button!
        • toolbarPanel
          JPanel toolbarPanel
          The editor panel visible for human players during the ShipPlacementPhase
        • winScreen
          WinScreenPanel winScreen
          Panel displayed when a player wins the game.

      • Serialized Fields

          QuadrantPanel enemyPane
          The panel representing the enemy's quadrant.
        • friendlyPane
          QuadrantPanel friendlyPane
          The panel representing the player's own quadrant.
        • panelsAdded
          boolean panelsAdded
          Indicates whether the panels have already been added to the layout.
        • scaledWaterDark
          Image scaledWaterDark
          The scaled version of the dark water animation image.
        • scaledWaterLight
          Image scaledWaterLight
          The scaled version of the light water animation image.
        • waterAnimation
          ImageIcon waterAnimation
          The light water animation displayed in the background.
        • waterAnimationDark
          ImageIcon waterAnimationDark
          The dark water animation displayed in the background.
        • waterDarkGif
          String waterDarkGif
          Path to the dark water animation resource.
        • waterGif
          String waterGif
          Path to the light water animation resource.

    • Class seasofyore.ui.CellPanel

      class CellPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • canInteract
          boolean canInteract
          Indicates whether this cell can currently interact with mouse events.
        • quadPanel
          QuadrantPanel quadPanel
          The parent panel containing this cell.
        • quadrant
          PlayerQuadrant quadrant
          The quadrant to which this cell belongs.
        • salvoLock
          boolean salvoLock
          Indicates whether this cell is locked for SALVO mode.
        • x
          int x
          The x-coordinate of this cell in the grid.
        • y
          int y
          The y-coordinate of this cell in the grid.

    • Class seasofyore.ui.QuadrantPanel

      class QuadrantPanel extends JLayeredPane implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cellMap
          TreeMap<String,CellPanel> cellMap
          Map of cell keys to CellPanel objects.
        • gameController
          GameController gameController
          The game controller managing this quadrant panel.
        • gridPanel
          JPanel gridPanel
          The grid panel for displaying cells.
        • imageCache
          Map<String,ImageIcon> imageCache
          Cache for ship images based on civilization, ship type, and direction.
        • isFriendly
          boolean isFriendly
          Indicates if this quadrant panel is friendly (the player's own panel).
        • listener
          QuadrantListener listener
          Listener for quadrant interactions, such as cell clicks or movements.
        • nullPath
          String nullPath
          Default image path for missing resources.
        • overlayPanel
          JPanel overlayPanel
          The overlay panel for rendering ships and effects.
        • owner
          Player owner
          The player who owns this quadrant panel.
        • quadrant
          PlayerQuadrant quadrant
          The player's corresponding game quadrant.

          The navy icon image.
        • selectedShip

          CustomButton toggleButton
